answers.answer: Hi mama! I was told I have gestational diabetes as well. I'm 36 weeks now. At first I freaked,not knowing anything about it. Although it ***** to prick yourself 4 times daily.I've been lucky to be able to control it with diet and exercise. However everyday is different for me. What was your high number? What did you eat? How many times a day were you asked to test?
I test 4 times a day. I didn't eat anything new. My number has never gone over 125 that's been the highest till today it was 187 and I just freaked! It's only happened this one time.

question: I have gestational diabetes and I'm 35 weeks going on 36 weeks and today was the first day I've had a high reading and I'm not sure why? I'm controlling my gestational diabetes with diet and exercise and have been doing fairly well until today. Anyone else with this problem? Thanks in advance! :)
title: gestational diabetes
